title: Rules:
description: Those who do not follow will be warned or muted, but will be banned if this becomes to excessive.

fields.name: 3. Speak in English only.
fields.value: This server is for all people around the world. So please speak in english in order for us to understand each other.

fields.name: 4. Don't ask members for their personal information and no DOXXING.
fields.value: We value other's personal info so please don't do this.

fields.name: 5. Don't ping staff.
fields.value: In case you see someone violating the rules, report to modmail instead. Otherwise if you're just doing that for trolling then you will get punished.

fields.name: 6. No politics and religious discussions.
fields.value: This is a hangout server, not a politics or a religious discord server. Plus it's annoying.

fields.name: 7. Follow Discord's TOS.
fields.value:
Read more about Discord's TOS here:
https://discord.com/terms
https://discord.com/guidelines
